newsitem.title: USA: Cimatron sees Q3 lower than estimates.
newsitem.headline: Cimatron sees Q3 lower than estimates.

text.p: Cimatron Ltd of Tel Aviv said Friday its third quarter results will be significantly lower than currently estimated by analysts and "substantially" lower than results in prior quarters.

The company said much of the anticipated decrease resulted from about $700,000 in expenses for its North American unit, Cimatron Technologies Inc, which is trying to expand the company's North American distribution network.
First Call estimates place third quarter earnings at $0.12 per share, and fourth quarter earnings at $0.18 per share.
As reported in July, the software company said it will exercise its option to buy 100 percent of the outstanding shares of Cimatron Technologies. The transaction should close September 30.
